attributes.action: Protect pub bar and restaurant industry,
attributes.additional_details:
Protect workers with immediate financial assistance .
Protect employers whether it's a sole trader small company or national company.
attributes.background: Currently by advising the public to stay at but not locking down bars pub and restaurant. The government is leaving the industry sector vulnerable to closures and terminations,  the government need to pass measures to combat this.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

If you want the Government to provide economic assistance for the hospitality industry, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302162

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
